page.title: 09BIOGRAPHY...WITHYHAM/ST.JOHN
page.content: My name is Jamie Donald. I am 8 years old and have one younger brother. I live near Forest Lodge Farm in a three-bedroomed{house.}My dad and uncle are busy building an extension which will give us a new bedroom, kitchen, utility room and study. Dad works at home. He is a{mechanic}and repairs cars. Our own car is a beat-up old Renault because we are spending all our money on the house. I get a lift to school because it is rather too far to walk. When I get home at 3.30 I change and play outside until six, when we eat as a{family.}Then I watch TV or play indoors until bedtime between 8 and 9. I see my grndparents every Sunday. We have a holiday flat in Spain and have just spent two weeks there.
